import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Alert } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../../styles/Assignment.css'; const Assignment = () => { const [showAlert, setShowAlert] = useState(false); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title: '', description: '', deadline: '', grade: '', section: '', file: null }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // In a real app, this would send data to backend setShowAlert(true); setTimeout(() => setShowAlert(false), 3000); // Reset form setFormData({ title: '', description: '', deadline: '', grade: '', section: '', file: null }); }; const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, files } = e.target; setFormData(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [name]: files ? files[0] : value })); }; return (
{showAlert && ( setShowAlert(false)} dismissible> Assignment created successfully! )}

Create Assignment

Create new assignments for your students

Create New Assignment

Grade {formData.grade || '-'} Section {formData.section || '-'}

Total Students: 35

Submissions: 28

80%
); }; export default Assignment;
